title: Execution failure blocks syncing
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2021.12.3-beta

OS & Version: Linux (Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS)

Commit hash : NA

#### Expected behaviour
Complete syncing

#### Actual behaviour
Execution failed at block 6031096

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Syncing from scratch
`./build/bin/erigon --datadir /mnt/md1/erigon/ --port 30306 --pprof --pprof.memprofilerate 524288 --pprof.blockprofilerate 0 --metrics --txpool.disable`

#### Backtrace

````
INFO[01-05|07:13:05.756] [4/15 Senders] Recovery                  block_number=13905703

INFO[01-05|07:14:39.063] [4/15 Senders] ETL [2/2] Loading         into=TxSender block=8314793 alloc="950.5 MiB" sys="7.4 GiB"
````
